import React from "react"; import { Book } from "./select-box-type/book"; import { DVD } from "./select-box-type/dvd"; import { Furniture } from "./select-box-type/furniture"; export const AddForm = ({handleDropdownChange,selectValue,maybe})=>{ return
{selectValue === "Book" && } {selectValue === "DVD" && } {selectValue === "Furniture" && }
